decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to utilize the Mystic Forge combo along with Urza's Workshop to generate massive amounts of mana and play powerful artifacts like The One Ring and Planar Nexus. The deck focuses on assembling key pieces like Karn, the Great Creator and Tezzeret, Cruel Captain to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy. With the help of cards like Manifold Key and Voltaic Key, the deck can create infinite loops and overwhelming board presence to secure victory.

This deck focuses on aggressive creatures and ways to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The key strategy is to deploy threats quickly and efficiently, using cards like Orcish Bowmasters and Amped Raptor to apply pressure. Additionally, the deck includes disruptive cards like Cabal Therapy and Thoughtseize to disrupt the opponent's plans. Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Voice of Victory provide additional power and resilience, while cards like Swords to Plowshares offer removal options. The mana base is optimized for consistency and includes key lands like Karakas and Wasteland to further disrupt the opponent.

The deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Reanimate, then bringing them back onto the battlefield for a game-winning combo. It includes various counterspells and card draw to protect the combo and dig for key pieces. The goal is to efficiently reanimate large threats like Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier, while disrupting the opponent's strategy with cards like Thoughtseize and Force of Will. It aims to overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats early in the game and secure victory through a combo finish.

The main strategy of this deck is to aggressively control the game by using efficient spells like Lightning Bolt, Force of Will, and Daze to disrupt opponents while applying pressure with creatures like Delver of Secrets, Dragon's Rage Channeler, and Murktide Regent. The deck also aims to utilize powerful card selection and filtering with Brainstorm and Ponder, while keeping opponents off balance with disruptive cards like Stifle and Wasteland. This deck is designed to quickly chip away at opponents' life totals and maintain control of the board to secure victories in fast-paced matchups.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize artifact cards in order to quickly build up a strong board presence and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck focuses on aggressive plays with cards like Lotus Petal and Mox Opal to power out powerful creatures like Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Memory Guardian. Additionally, the deck includes disruptive elements like Tormod's Crypt and Force of Will to control the opponent's graveyard and counter their spells. Using Urza's Saga as a toolbox, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of creatures and artifact synergy.

The main concept of this deck is to use artifact cards to quickly ramp up mana and control the board, while also utilizing blue spells to disrupt the opponent's strategy. By efficiently deploying artifacts like Mox Opal and Lotus Petal, along with powerful creatures like Emry, Lurker of the Loch, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with early aggression and disruption. The use of cards like Force of Will and Urza's Saga helps to maintain tempo and protect key cards, ensuring a strong board presence and potential for quick victories.

This deck focuses on using Nadu, Winged Wisdom to create a powerful creature combo with Fiend Artisan and other creatures like Craterhoof Behemoth. It also includes protection cards like Sylvan Safekeeper and Endurance to ensure the combo goes off smoothly. Mana acceleration is provided by cards like Gaea's Cradle and Green Sun's Zenith. The deck includes a toolbox of creatures that can be searched for with Fiend Artisan and Green Sun's Zenith, allowing for flexibility in adapting to different situations and opponents. Overall, the deck aims to quickly assemble its combo pieces and overwhelm the opponent with a powerful board presence.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly put pressure on the opponent by playing efficient creatures like Dragon's Rage Channeler and Delver of Secrets, backed up by disruptive spells like Force of Will and Daze to protect them. The deck aims to control the board with cards like Lightning Bolt and Wasteland, while also maintaining card advantage and consistency with cantrips like Ponder and Brainstorm. The deck also utilizes cards like Brazen Borrower and Murktide Regent to quickly close out games and out-value the opponent.

The deck focuses on utilizing lands to control the game, using cards like Wasteland, Thespian's Stage, and Life from the Loam to disrupt the opponent's mana base while also ramping up mana production. It also includes cards like Expedition Map and Crop Rotation to tutor for key lands like Dark Depths and The Tabernacle at Pendrell Vale. The deck aims to establish a strong board presence with powerful land cards like Urza's Saga and Boseiju, Who Endures, while also using disruptive spells like Malevolent Rumble to control the opponent's strategy.

The deck focuses on utilizing the synergy between Cephalid Illusionist and Nomads en-Kor to mill cards from your library and combo off with Dread Return to bring back key pieces like Thassa's Oracle for a win. The deck also runs several protection cards like Force of Will and Swords to Plowshares to ensure the combo goes off smoothly. Urza's Saga is used for additional tutor abilities, while cards like Ponder and Brainstorm help with card selection and digging for combo pieces. Overall, the deck aims to quickly assemble its combo pieces to win the game.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly and aggressively deploy Eldrazi creatures onto the battlefield, utilizing cards like Eldrazi Temple and Ancient Tomb to ramp up mana quickly. Chalice of the Void and Thought-Knot Seer disrupt the opponent's game plan while Glaring Fleshraker and Reality Smasher provide powerful threats. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with big creatures and efficient disruption, utilizing the Eldrazi tribal theme to create a fast-paced and aggressive playstyle.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize artifacts and fast mana sources to quickly deploy threats on the board, while disrupting the opponent with disruption spells like Sink into Stupor and Force of Will. Emry, Lurker of the Loch helps to recur artifacts from the graveyard, while Urza's Saga provides additional value by tutoring for key artifacts. The deck aims to apply consistent pressure on the opponent with a mix of aggressive creatures like Kappa Cannoneer and Pinnacle Emissary, supported by synergistic artifacts like Mox Opal and Mishra's Bauble.

The focus of this deck is on disrupting opponents with control elements like Thoughtseize and Skyclave Apparition, while using aggressive creatures like Stoneforge Mystic and Recruiter of the Guard to pressure them. The deck also utilizes cards like Aether Vial and Karakas to cheat in creatures and protect key pieces. The addition of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion allows for additional value and flexibility in longer games. Overall, the deck aims to disrupt opponents' game plan while deploying threats and generating advantage to secure victory.

The deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Thoughtseize, then bringing them back onto the battlefield through reanimation spells like Reanimate and Animate Dead. It also utilizes counter magic like Force of Will and Force of Negation to protect its combo pieces and disrupt opponents. The deck includes versatile threats like Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Brazen Borrower, as well as big finishers like Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier. The mana base includes fetch lands and dual lands to ensure consistency in casting spells.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize powerful artifacts and aggressive creatures to quickly overwhelm the opponent. By combining cards like Urza's Bauble, Mox Opal, and Lotus Petal with creatures like Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Kappa Cannoneer, the deck can generate fast mana and consistent card advantage. Using cards like Force of Will for disruption and Sink into Stupor for control, the deck aims to establish a board presence and press the advantage quickly, putting pressure on the opponent from the very beginning of the game.

The deck focuses on assembling the Painter's Servant and Grindstone combo to mill the opponent's deck. It utilizes various artifacts like Mana Rocks and Key cards to generate mana and activate the combo as quickly as possible. Karn, the Great Creator and Tezzeret, Cruel Captain provide additional support and alternative win conditions. The deck aims to control the board while setting up the combo to win the game in a quick and efficient manner, leveraging the power of its artifact synergy and powerful artifacts to dominate the game.
